messages.content: On 12th December we can vote for real change. From sorting out Brexit, saving the NHS, and tackling the climate crisis, if you elect me I will always put Reading West first.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Conservatives are putting our NHS at risk through their reckless trade deal with Donald Trump and a continuing squeeze on funding. Labour will guarantee the NHS's working week properly and will keep our hospital staff, including the bursary for nurses.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: STOP SCHOOL CUTS AND SUPPORT FAMILIES WITH CHILDREN
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will properly fund our schools, build 1000 new Sure Start centres and provide free school meals for all primary school children.
2017 was very close. Labour almost won with 2876 of winning votes. Vote for Rachel and put our community first again.
Labour will let people have the final say on Brexit with a public vote.
Labour will back strong, urgent action to tackle the climate crisis and investment in sustainable jobs.
Labour will prioritise local traders and small businesses and will raise their voice in Parliament.

mentions.tacticalSituation: It will be incredibly close between Labour and the Conservatives here.

issues.education: Labour will properly fund our schools, build 1000 new Sure Start centres and provide free school meals for all primary school children.
issues.socialWelfare: Labour will guarantee the NHS's working week properly and will keep our hospital staff, including the bursary for nurses.

community.content: Reading West is my home; it's where I run my award-winning small business and where I am bringing up my family. I grew up here in Reading, and helped support our community again just as my mum did before me.

leaflet.personalStatement: As your MP, I promise to fight for our schools, NHS, police, health and small businesses.

endorsements.endorser: Hannah Sawyer, NHS Nurse, West Reading
endorsements.endorsement: As a nurse in the NHS working and living locally, I want to vote for Rachel! Reading West needs an MP who cares about the community and Rachel will fight for the NHS spending.

endorsements.endorser: Stephen Pierce, SME Owner, West Berkshire
endorsements.endorsement: I am voting Labour because I am the director of a small business and I believe Rachel will support my company and put small businesses first.

quotes.text: It will be incredibly close between Labour and the Conservatives here.

examples: 2017 was very close. Labour almost won with 2876 of winning votes.
From sorting out Brexit, saving the NHS, and tackling the climate crisis, if you elect me I will always put Reading West first.
As a nurse in the NHS working and living locally, I want to vote for Rachel! Reading West needs an MP who cares about the community and Rachel will fight for the NHS spending.
I am voting Labour because I am the director of a small business and I believe Rachel will support my company and put small businesses first.
Labour will let people have the final say on Brexit with a public vote.
Labour will back strong, urgent action to tackle the climate crisis and investment in sustainable jobs.
Labour will prioritise local traders and small businesses and will raise their voice in Parliament.
Reading West is my home; it's where I run my award-winning small business and where I am bringing up my family.

Rachel Eden
